attributes.action: withdraw free bus travel for over 60's and give it to school children up to the age of 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
over 60's use public transport to socialise, which is a PRIVILAGE, school children use it to go to school, which is a RIGHT.
why should we pay for our rights but not for our privileges.
also over 60's use it about once a week, school children use it 5 times a week which is worth giving us free travel because if over 60's get free travel, our fares go up, which means it costs more to get school.
